title: M (1951) |Joseph Losey| David Wayne, Howard Da Silva, Raymond Burr - Film Noir Full Movie

sources.title: M1951 202002
sources.description: M is a 1951 American film noir directed by Joseph Lose y. It is a remake of Fritz Lang's 1931 German film of the same name about a child murderer. This version shifts the action from Berlin to Los Angeles. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M_(1951_film) Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.
